text: Hagi Mikaia'ma kini ne' Ahapu avugama ehanatigeno'a, Ahapu'a amanage huno antahige'ne, Mikaiaga Ramot-giliati vahera marerina hara ome huzmantenufi hara ome huozmantenue? Higeno Mikaia'a amanage huno kenona hu'ne, vunka hara ome huzmanto. Na'ankure Ra Anumzamo'a ana maka vahera kazampi zamavarentegahie.
